name: CAP_PAY_EL_REF_LKUP_TABLE
description:
This table will be deprecated. To continue accessing this data, use the REFINEMENT_LOOKUP_TABLE_ID column from the CAP_PAY_EL_DETAILS table.





The refinement tables used to compute the rate.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the transaction record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: REFINEMENT_LOOKUP_TABLE_ID
columns.description: This column will be deprecated. To continue accessing this data, use the REFINEMENT_LOOKUP_TABLE_ID column from the CAP_PAY_EL_DETAILS table.  The additional refinement tables used to look up a member's rate.

columns.name: REFINEMENT_LOOKUP_TABLE_ID_RATE_TABLE_NAME
columns.description: Name of the capitation rate table.
